metadata.title: Friday, 22nd March, 2019
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE TWELFTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Housing and Infrastructure Development
parts: (a) when the construction of the following bridges on D145 Road in Feira Parliamentary Constituency will commence:
(b) who the contractor for the project is;
(c) what the total cost of the project is; and
(d) what the time frame for the completion of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Housing and Infrastructure Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to rehabilitate theÂ  Lunchu Bridge, which is in a deplorable condition, in Lunchu Ward in Kapiri Mposhi Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) whether a contractor for the project has been identified; and
(d) if so, what the name of the contractor is.
